Package org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.rest

Class JsonPolicyParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.rest.JsonPolicyParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PolicyParser
    public final class JsonPolicyParser
extends Object
implements PolicyParser
    Parses entitlements policies ("privileges") to/from JSON representations.
    Since:
    12.0.0

        public Privilege parsePolicy​(String name,
                             org.forgerock.json.JsonValue json)
                      throws EntitlementException
        Description copied from interface: PolicyParser
        Parses the given JSON policy representation into an entitlements policy (privilege).
        Specified by:
        parsePolicy in interface PolicyParser
        Parameters:
        name - a unique id to assign to the policy.
        json - the representation of the policy in JSON.
        Returns:
        the equivalent policy.
        Throws:
        EntitlementException - if an error occurs parsing the policy.
